name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather

reviews.name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I thought of when I was going to pick up this bed was I better check the box for damage . I cant believe it came all the way from Cali to the Burgh without Any box damage. All the parts were there in very good packaging. Easy setup. No box spring necessary. Looks expensive. Great bed.
reviews.title: Impressed

reviews.name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: I am missing pieces. Specifically the pieces that fit on the slats to hold them in place... Abt 39 pics. I slept on it last night with my husband, but obviously we were worried about the slats moving. Thankfully they didn't and hopefully today I can order the missing parts from the manufacturer. Other than that... I like the bed. It's very sturdy, elegant, and a steal for the price.
reviews.title: Good, but...

reviews.name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText:
My husband and I purchased this bed after finding out we were pregnant and realized I need a bed lower to the ground than the one we had. We didn't have 2,000.00 for a new bedroom set or expensive furniture store showroom piece, but still wanted something that looked nice. I loved the look right away when I saw it online and loved the price even more. So we took a chance with a walmart bed. It arrived to our house so much sooner than we expected. It was pretty easy to put together. And both my husband and I were so suprised at how sturdy it was. I mean, not just for Walmart, but for any bed.

Another reason we chose this bed was no box spring was required for our memory foam matress. The support is amazing.

We have been sleeping on this bed for a good month now and still can't get over what a deal it was.

Makes my bedroom look sharp. It's sturdy. And it was a great value.
For anyone with the "Walmart fears" about cheap flimsy furniture. Don't fret!! Buy this bed!!
reviews.title: Great bed!!

reviews.name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed and put it together myself. The price was great and looked better than I expected. I originally thought it would be a temporary purchase but I now think I will keep it for a lot longer. It was easier to put together than I thought and didn't take as long.
reviews.title: Great value for the price.

reviews.name: Maison Queen Upholstered Bed, Vintage Espresso Faux Leather
reviews.reviewText: Theres were missing pieces! This bed was once tried to assemble, it was used or the display at the store but it arrived w vital pieces missing. Modifications were required. But nice product when done
reviews.title: Bed is nice buuut...
